document.full_text: kobe bryant shook off an ankle sprain and the los angeles lakers relied on their big men to beat the dallas mavericks 96-91 in a showdown of two of the western conference's top teams saturday.
document.title: hobbling bryant helps lakers down mavericks
lines_and_colors: kobe bryant shook off an ankle sprain and the los angeles lakers relied on their big men to beat the dallas mavericks 96-91 in a showdown of two of the western conference's top teams saturday.
